import React, { useState } from 'react'; const UniversalForm = props => { const [isValid,setValid] = useState(false); const validation = event =>{ const form = event.target; if (form.checkValidity() === false) { event.preventDefault(); event.stopPropagation(); } setValid(true); } return(
